name: Black Sun
description:
Made  for the SOS 2019 Game Jam!

Inspired by the song Black Sun by Deadly Avenger

-------------------------------------------------

In this game you must maneuver around the screen, surviving, and trying to line yourself up with enemies in order to get the highest score possible.

Controls are simple, requiring only the mouse and left mouse button in order to play

-------------------------------------------------

Music made by Lemoncreme on freesound.org

https://freesound.org/people/Lemoncreme/sounds/231578/

Sound effects made by josepharaoh99

https://freesound.org/people/josepharaoh99/sounds/361636/
